DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate user preference ease use FreeStyle InsuLinx system , compare current methodology , use home subject diabetes . Subjects also compare ease use FreeStyle InsuLinx system comparator meter .
DOC.brief_title: Ease Use New Blood Glucose Meter With In-built Insulin Calculator Home Study
DOC.criteria: Subject Type 1 2 diabetes bolus regime ( U100 insulin ) , one bolus injection per day least 6 month ; Age 18 yr ; Regularly test SMBG 3 time per day ; Willingness test least 4 time per day . Know require bolus injection 50U single dose ; Has previously use either InsuLinx assign comparison meter ; Participated structure diabetes management training last 6 month Is currently insulin pump ; Has concomitant disease , Investigator 's opinion , may compromise patient safety ; Is participate another study glucose monitoring device drug could affect glucose measurement glucose management ; Female subject pregnant planning become pregnant course study .
